p: Loss of smell and taste: This symptom is present in intubated-ICU patients (36.1%), non-intubated ICU patients (19.8%), non-ICU patients (31.3%), and healthy subjects (0%). It is increased in all 3 patient groups compared to healthy subjects (p < 0.01) and is of moderate severity compared to all symptoms in all patient groups. This symptom is less common in non-intubated-ICU patients compared to other patients (p < 0.01).
